title: so with late game warding nerfed with trinkets can we....
body: Finally get a slot just for control wards. I wouldnt even care if you could only carry 1 control ward at a time in this slot, but for once I would really like to be able to buy a control ward but cant because I have 3 components of an item and can't fit it. with baron and elder dragon having lower spawn times as well its not like having a control ward is going to stop the game from ending I am just literally tired of buying a control ward, placing said control ward, and then losing said control ward and not having space to buy another.
